title: Lord! Remember Me
verses: Je-sus! thou art the sinner's Friend; As
such I look to thee....... Now in the
Lord, re-mem-ber me....... Now in the
bow-els of thy love, Oh, Lord! re-mem-ber me.
bow-els of thy love, Oh, Lord! re-mem-ber me.

Remember thy pure word of grace,
Remember Calvary;
Remember all thy dying groans,
And then remember me.

O remember Adam's fall with God!
I yield myself to thee;
While thou art sitting on thy throne,
Oh, Lord! remember me.

I own I'm guilty, own I'm vile,
Yet thy salvation's free:
Then, in thy all-abounding grace,
Oh, Lord! remember me.

Howe'er forsaken or distressed,
Howe'er oppressed I be,
Howe'er afflicted here on earth,
Do thou remember me.

And when I close my eyes in death,
And creature helps all flee,
Then, oh my great Redeemer, God!
I pray, remember me.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Personal plea for remembrance and salvation through Christ
